medical_history.chief_complaint: Planning to conceive while managing type 2 diabetes and hypertension.
medical_history.history_of_present_illness: Type 2 diabetes diagnosed in 1999. Hypertension diagnosed in 1996, controlled with medication. After gastric bypass in 2004, experienced significant weight loss, leading to improved menstrual regularity. Currently struggling with iron-deficiency anemia and concerns about future pregnancy risks due to diabetes and gastric bypass.
medical_history.past_medical_history: Type 2 diabetes, hypertension, history of herpes simplex virus, prior diagnosis of polycystic ovary syndrome, anticardiolipin antibodies, and iron-deficiency anemia post-gastric bypass surgery.
medical_history.family_history: Sister has anticardiolipin antibodies and there is a strong family history of thromboses.
medical_history.social_history: Works as a midwife, married, lives with husband and son, no history of tobacco, alcohol, or drug use.
